abstract: Andy Bechtolsheim, the co-founder of Sun, has a new venture, which has designed a switch to handle vast amounts of data at low cost.
snippet: Andy Bechtolsheim, the co-founder of Sun, has a new venture, which has designed a switch to handle vast amounts of data at low cost.
lead_paragraph: 4:19 p.m. | Updated  One of Arista’s competitors offered a comment on Arista’s  plans.

headline.main: A Switch for the Google Age
